title: Geth full node not syncing when started.
body:
I started an Ethereum full node using ./geth-alltools/geth --datadir ./dataNew --syncmode full --config=config.toml. However, eth.syncing constantly returns false, and eth.blockNumber also remains at 0.

> geth log
```
- [ ] ./geth-alltools/geth --datadir ./dataNew --syncmode full --config=config.toml
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.259] Starting Geth on Ethereum mainnet...
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.259] Bumping default cache on mainnet         provided=1024 updated=4096
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.264] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.265] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.269] Set global gas cap                       cap=50,000,000
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.271] Allocated trie memory caches             clean=614.00MiB dirty=1024.00MiB
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.271] Using leveldb as the backing database
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.271] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/home/njl/Temp/Ethereum/dataNew/geth/chaindata cache=2.00GiB handles=524,288
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.282] Using LevelDB as the backing database

- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.292] Disk storage enabled for ethash caches   dir=/home/njl/Temp/Ethereum/dataNew/geth/ethash count=3
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.292] Disk storage enabled for ethash DAGs     dir=/home/njl/.ethash count=2
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.292] Initialising Ethereum protocol           network=1 dbversion=<nil>
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.293] Writing default main-net genesis block
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.594] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=12356 size=1.78MiB time=23.660377ms gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=1 livesize=0.00B
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.614]
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.614] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.614] Chain ID:  1 (mainnet)

- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.615]
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.615] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- [ ] WARN [11-13|10:48:21.615] Failed to load snapshot                  err="missing or corrupted snapshot"

- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.616] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=d7f897..0f0544 accounts=0 slots=0 storage=0.00B dangling=0 elapsed="410.891Âµs"

- [ ] WARN [11-13|10:48:21.616] Error reading unclean shutdown markers   error="leveldb: not found"
- [ ] WARN [11-13|10:48:21.616] Engine API enabled                       protocol=eth
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.617] Starting peer-to-peer node               instance=Geth/v1.11.6-stable-ea9e62ca/linux-amd64/go1.20.3
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.622] New local node record                    seq=1,699,843,701,621 id=d806fb12067ba802 ip=127.0.0.1 udp=30303 tcp=30303
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.624] Started P2P networking                   self=enode://80683e498d687ae6b23023136f5ad11ec30050afd1629674cf7d53ede8c1ab0ba56a908b9e77fd0f9d2ba2d217c48ed80e4b1053b4bfbe32c507cbf4ea6f6197@127.0.0.1:30303
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.626] IPC endpoint opened                      url=/home/njl/Temp/Ethereum/dataNew/geth.ipc
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.626] Generated JWT secret                     path=/home/njl/Temp/Ethereum/dataNew/geth/jwtsecret
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.627] WebSocket enabled                        url=ws://127.0.0.1:8551
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.627] HTTP server started                      endpoint=127.0.0.1:8551 auth=true prefix= cors=localhost vhosts=localhost
- [ ] INFO [11-13|10:48:21.655] Generated state snapshot                 accounts=8893 slots=0 storage=409.64KiB dangling=0 elapsed=39.735ms
- [ ] WARN [11-13|10:48:56.619] Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain!
- [ ] WARN [11-13|10:53:56.667] Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain!
```


Terminal
```
> eth.syncing
false
> eth.blockNumber
0
```

You need to setup an associated beacon node in order to trigger the sync.

Check out the [tutorial here](https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/getting-started/consensus-clients) for more information.
